title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1999/93 of 23 July 1993 fixing for the 1993/94 marketing year the production aid for tinned pineapple and the minimum price to be paid to pineapple producers
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1999/93 of 23 July 1993 fixing for the 1993/94 marketing year the production aid for tinned pineapple and the minimum price to be paid to pineapple producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1993/94 marketing year:
(a) the minimum price referred to in Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 525/77 to be paid to producers for pineapples; and
(b) the production aid referred to in Article 5 of the said Regulation for tinned pineapple;
shall be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 73, 21. 3. 1977, p. 46.
(2) OJ No L 163, 22. 6. 1985, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(4) OJ No L 158, 30. 6. 1993, p. 18.
(5) OJ No L 57, 10. 3. 1993, p. 18.
(6) OJ No L 132, 29. 5. 1993, p. 114.
ANNEX
Minimum price to be paid to the producers   Production aid
